about_the_game:
SPUD CUSTOMS DEMO - Where Papers, Please Meets Missile Command!

Guard the checkpoint of Spud in this unique endless arcade experience. Every shift tests your judgment as you inspect documents, expose lies, and blast desperate runners with missile defense systems!

Key Features:

  • Unique Gameplay Fusion: Master both careful document inspection AND rapid-fire missile defense! Only you stand between order and chaos at the world's most exciting checkpoint.

  • Endless Mode Challenge:

    • Compete for high scores

    • Face increasingly difficult waves

    • Test your skills and survival

  • Perfect for Any Schedule:

    • Quick 5-15 minute sessions

    • Simple controls, deep strategy

    • Jump in and out anytime

    • No grinding required!

  • Balanced Difficulty Options:

    • Adjust document time limits & missile defense to suit your taste

    • Normal for balanced challenge

    • Expert for hardcore players

Remember: In Spud, every potato is either cleared for entry or becomes target practice! How long can you maintain order at the checkpoint?

🥔 READY TO SERVE? 🥔

  • Try the demo and wishlist the full game to get notified at launch!

  • Join our Discord community to help shape development

  • Launch discount planned for early supporters

  • Perfect for fans of Papers Please, arcade games, and unique genre blends

Your shift at the world's most dangerous checkpoint awaits. How many waves can you survive?

reviews:
“Super awesome game that is very reminiscent of papers please”
Barry Richter (Ludum Dare 56)

“The UI and sound design is really well done. And the gameplay is REALLY addicting. This one was very fun”
SK Vader (Ludum Dare 56)

“I really liked this game! It’s awesome!”
Kirass (Ludum Dare 56)
short_description: Try the SPUD CUSTOMS DEMO! As a border officer, inspect documents and decide the fate of potatoes in this endless arcade challenge. When rejects storm your checkpoint, defend it with missiles! Test your skills in this unique blend of document inspection and missile defense action.
